[Document(page_content='developing a project schedule.

(cid:190) Project Schedule: February – April 2021

Bluffs Park Workout Station

(cid:190) Updates: The contractor is waiting for the delivery of the new workout
station equipment. The equipment is anticipated to be delivered at the end
of February.

(cid:190) Project Schedule: November 2020 – March 2021

Civic Center Way Improvements

(cid:190) Updates:

(cid:131) Work Hours: Monday through Friday 7:00AM to 4:00PM, Saturdays

7:00AM to 4:00PM

(cid:131) The contractor is currently working at the section between Vista
Pacifica and the condos on Civic Center Way. This phase of work will
require the temporary closure of Civic Center Way. Portions of the
curb and gutter have been placed and the contactor is working on the
proposed retaining wall. This portion of work is anticipated to be
completed in early February 2021.', metadata={'chunk_index': 4, 'source': 'data/civic/extracted_data/malibucity_agenda__03022021-1648.txt', 'start_index': 3619}), Document(page_content='February 1, 2021.

(cid:131) The State is reviewing the City’s application for the State Revolving

Fund program.

(cid:131) The project assessment engineer has begun

the process of

evaluating the project costs.

(cid:131) Next public community meeting is scheduled for March 25th.

(cid:190) Project Schedule:

(cid:131) Complete Design: December 2021
(cid:131) Begin Construction: March 2022

Page 2 of 6

Agenda Item # 4.A.










Malibu Park Drainage Improvements

(cid:190) Updates:

(cid:131) Staff is making minor modifications to the project plans to reduce the

overall project costs.

(cid:131) Project is scheduled to go out to bid next week.

(cid:190) Project Schedule:

(cid:131) Complete Design: February 2021
(cid:131) Begin Construction: April 2021

Capital Improvement Projects (Construction)

City Hall Roof Replacement

(cid:190) Updates: The City has held project meetings with the contractor and is

developing a project schedule.', metadata={'chunk_index': 3, 'source': 'data/civic/extracted_data/malibucity_agenda__03022021-1648.txt', 'start_index': 2692}), Document(page_content='(cid:131) The contractor is also working on the curb, gutter and storm drain
installation on Civic Center Way from Webb Way to the condos. This
portion of the work may require temporary road closures. However, it
is anticipated that this phase of the project will be completed at the
end of February 2021.

(cid:190) Project Schedule: August 2020 through March 2021

Page 3 of 6

Agenda Item # 4.A.








Capital Improvement Projects (Not Started)

Annual Street Maintenance

(cid:190) Project Description: This project provides for the reconstruction and

maintenance of City streets.

(cid:190) Estimated Schedule:

(cid:131) Complete Design: Spring 2021
(cid:131) Begin Construction: Summer 2021

Bluffs Park Shade Structure

(cid:190) Project Description: This project consists of the installation of four single-

post shade structures at Malibu Bluffs Park

(cid:190) Estimated Schedule:

(cid:131) Complete Design: Summer 2021
(cid:131) Begin Construction: Fall 2021', metadata={'chunk_index': 5, 'source': 'data/civic/extracted_data/malibucity_agenda__03022021-1648.txt', 'start_index': 4481}), Document(page_content='(cid:190) Updates:

(cid:131) The City has hired a consultant to design this project. The design has

started and is anticipated to be completed by the Spring of 2022.

(cid:190) Estimated Schedule:

(cid:131) Complete Design: Spring 2022
(cid:131) Begin Construction: Fall 2022

Westward Beach Road Shoulder Repairs (CalOES Project)

(cid:190) Project Description: The project consists of repairs the damaged shoulder on

Westward Beach Road.

(cid:190) Upates:

(cid:131) This project is currently under design with the City’s consultant. It is
anticipated that the final design will be complete by July 2022. The
project will be advertised for construction bids with construction
beginning in Fall 2022.

(cid:190) Estimated Schedule:

(cid:131) Complete Design: July 2022
(cid:131) Begin Construction: Fall 2022

(cid:131) Complete Design: April 2021
(cid:131) Begin Construction: Summer 2021

PCH Median Improvements Project

management.

node_3.prompt:
content="You are an assistant for question-answering tasks. Use the following pieces of retrieved context to answer the question. If you don't know the answer, just say that you don't know. Use three sentences maximum and keep the answer concise.
Question: What are the names of projects starting before 2022? Only return the answer required by the question. There is no need to include extra information such as reasons. Separate the answers with commas if there are multiple items. Return None if no answer is found. 
Context: skip for short 
Answer:"

in_data: Bluffs Park Workout Station, Civic Center Way Improvements, Annual Street Maintenance, Bluffs Park Shade Structure, Outdoor Warning Sirens (FEMA Project), Storm Drain Master Plan (FEMA Project)
